name: My Obsession (PC/Android)
description:
Obsession is not just about feelings of attraction to a person; it can be attraction to an experience, item, utility, etc. To figure out whether obsession is negative or positive, it is enough to find whether attraction that exists is to negative or positive things. Attraction to something that brings pleasure is positive; however, if you cannot get what you want, then this attraction brings negative feeling. Therefore, obsession depends mainly what attracts a person. Obsession can be also a bad habit if a person is obsessed with some object that the person will never possess. Such an obsession wears off an individual, however, if this obsession drives a person to reach the goal, then such an obsession will serve an individual as a reinforcement, which brings us to a philosophical question what is reinforcement obsession itself, or the object a person is obsessed with.

Supported on:

  • Windows
  • Android
